TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Blend extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义 对象的混合图案。

span.span: Defines a blend pattern for a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 渐变通常用于顺利带有阴影的形状的内部。Gradients are commonly used to smoothly shade the interiors of shapes. 混合模式由两个数组 (和)，每个包含相同数量的元素。A blend pattern is defined by two arrays ( and ) that each contain the same number of elements. 每个元素数组均表示沿渐变线的距离的比例。Each element of the array represents a proportion of the distance along the gradient line. 每个元素数组均表示的起始和结束位置沿渐变线中的相应元素所表示的渐变混合中的颜色的比例数组。Each element of the array represents the proportion of the starting and ending colors in the gradient blend at the position along the gradient line represented by the corresponding element in the array. 例如，如果对应的元素和数组 0.2 和 0.3，分别是，对于从蓝色到红沿 100 像素行，该行 （20%的距离) 沿颜色 20 像素的线性渐变包含 30%蓝色和红色的 70%。For example, if corresponding elements of the and arrays are 0.2 and 0.3, respectively, for a linear gradient from blue to red along a 100-pixel line, the color 20 pixels along that line (20 percent of the distance) consists of 30 percent blue and 70 percent red. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在用于在 Windows 窗体环境中。The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment. 它演示了如何使用结合类类来绘制椭圆向屏幕具有混合其颜色。It demonstrates how to use the class in conjunction with the class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended. 椭圆是蓝色在左侧，为在中心的红色混合和混合右侧的蓝色上一步。The ellipse is blue on the left, blends to red in the center, and blends back to blue on the right. 这通过中的设置来实现`myFactors`和`myPositions`中使用的数组和属性。This is accomplished through the settings in the `myFactors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the and properties. 请注意，属性对象名为`lgBrush2`必须进行等于对象`myBlend`。Note that the property of the object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the object `myBlend`. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#3)]

[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 用指定的因子和位置的数目初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified number of factors and positions.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ Factors { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于渐变的混合因子数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of blend factors for the gradient.

value.span: 混合因子数组，这些因子指定在相应位置处使用的起始色和结束色的百分比。

span.span: An array of blend factors that specify the percentages of the starting color and the ending color to be used at the corresponding position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，此数组的元素是一个介于 0.0 到 1.0 f f。Typically, the elements of this array are a value from 0.0f through 1.0f. 这些元素指定的结束颜色和要使用在相应的起始颜色百分比 blend 位置。These elements specify the percentages of the ending color and the starting color to use at the corresponding blend position. 例如，值为 0.2 指示，指定位置的混合的颜色组成的渐变的结束颜色的 20%和 80%的起始渐变颜色。For example, a value of 0.2 indicates that at the specified position, the blended color is composed of 20 percent of the ending gradient color and 80 percent of the starting gradient color. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通过设置和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class by setting the and properties. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到导入的窗体命名空间。Paste the code into a form that imports the namespace. 处理窗体的事件并调用`DemonstrateBlend`方法，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form's event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ Positions { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置渐变的混合位置的数组。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of blend positions for the gradient.

value.span: 混合位置的数组，这些位置指定沿渐变线距离的百分比。

span.span: An array of blend positions that specify the percentages of distance along the gradient line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数组的元素指定距离沿渐变线的百分比。The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line. 例如，元素值 0.2 f 指定此点为 20%的起始点的总距离。For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point. 此数组中的元素由 0.0 f 和 1.0 f 之间的浮点值表示。The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f. 数组的第一个元素必须是 0.0 f，并且最后一个元素必须为 1.0 f。The first element of the array must be 0.0f, and the last element must be 1.0f. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类通过设置和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class by setting the and properties. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 将代码粘贴到导入的窗体命名空间。Paste the code into a form that imports the namespace. 处理窗体的事件并调用`DemonstrateBlend`方法，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form's event and call the `DemonstrateBlend` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Misc2#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Misc2/VB/form1.vb#5)]
